be.ac.ulb.infof307.g06.presentation.versioning.difference

Class DifferenceController

  • java.lang.Object
    • be.ac.ulb.infof307.g06.presentation.versioning.difference.DifferenceController
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    DifferenceListener

    public class DifferenceController
extends java.lang.Object
implements DifferenceListener
    Invoke the gui showing differences between string. State is used as the indication if the user has chosen to comply with the changes ( merge,revert,...)

      • DifferenceController

        public DifferenceController(javafx.stage.Stage oldStage,
                            java.lang.String operation,
                            java.lang.String master,
                            java.lang.String branch)
        Create the difference between string for merge, revert, ...
        Parameters:
        oldStage - the stage on which we get info used for the new stage.
        operation - the action performed (merge, revert, ...)
        master - the master name.
        branch - the branch name from which the operation will be made.

      • initializeTextArea

        public void initializeTextArea(java.util.ArrayList<java.lang.String> originalText,
                               java.util.ArrayList<java.util.ArrayList<java.lang.String>> newTextData)
        this function is to be used before showing the stage info : use StringComparator splitIntoArrayList to transform a String to an Array list string
        Parameters:
        originalText - a simple arraylist of the original text used to be displayed
        newTextData - a array list with the different differences between texts

      • show

        public void show()

      • getState

        public java.lang.Boolean getState()
        Returns:
        get the operation status if the button ok is clicked it means the user agreed on the operation (merge/revert/...) and state is used to gather the information about user intent

      • changeState

        public void changeState(boolean b)
        Specified by:
        changeState in interface DifferenceListener
        Parameters:
        b - indicate if the button ok or cancel was pressed
